info.title: Cyclotron API
info.description: Cyclotron's REST API for Dashboard management

get.description: The Dashboards endpoint returns a list of Dashboards, excluding those that are deleted.  The list can be optionally filtered by a query string.

parameters.name: q
parameters.description: The q parameter can be a string value or comma-separated list of values, where each value is used as a partial match for the Dashboard name, or an exact match of one of the Dashboard's tags.

200.description: An array of Dashboards (without the Dashboard definition)

post.description: Posting to the Dashboards endpoint creates a new Dashboard.

parameters.name: dashboard
parameters.description: The Dashboard to be created.

200.description: The created Dashboard, including auto-populated fields such as date, rev, etc.

400.description: Missing Dashboard name, or Dashboard definition.

401.description: Authentication required: session key not provided.

get.description: The Dashboard endpoint returns a given Dashboard by name.  This works regardless of whether or not the Dashboard is deleted.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The Dashboard name.

401.description: Authentication required: this dashboard has restricted permissions.

403.description: View Permission denied for this Dashboard.

put.description: Putting a modified Dashboard back to this endpoint overwrites the existing Dashboard with the modified version.  The revision counter is incremented, and a new revision is added to the /revisions endpoint.  If the Dashboard was deleted previously, it will be undeleted.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The Dashboard name.

parameters.name: dashboard
parameters.description: The modified Dashboard.

200.description: The updated Dashboard, including auto-populated fields such as date, rev, etc.

400.description: Missing Dashboard name, or Dashboard definition.

401.description: Authentication required: session key not provided.

403.description: Edit Permission denied for this Dashboard.

delete.description: Performs a soft delete, whereby the deleted flag is set to true and the Dashboard is automatically excluded from search results.  The Dashboard can still be requested directly by name, and undeleted.  The delete operation creates a new Revision.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The Dashboard name.

200.description: The deleted Dashboard, including auto-populated fields such as date, rev, etc.

401.description: Authentication required: session key not provided.

403.description: Edit Permission denied for this Dashboard.

put.description: The Dashboard Tags endpoint allows setting only the tags for a Dashboard.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The Dashboard name.

parameters.name: tags
parameters.description: The modified Dashboard.

200.description: The updated Dashboard, including auto-populated fields such as date, rev, etc.

401.description: Authentication required: session key not provided.

403.description: Edit Permission denied for this Dashboard.

get.description: The Dashboard Revisions endpoint returns all the revisions for a Dashboard.  This works regardless of whether or not the Dashboard is deleted.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The Dashboard name.

200.description: An array of Dashboard Revisions (each without the Dashboard definition)

get.description: The Dashboard Revision endpoint returns a specifc revision for a Dashboard.  This works regardless of whether or not the Dashboard is deleted.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The Dashboard name.

parameters.name: revision
parameters.description: The revision parameter specifies which Revision to return.

401.description: Authentication required: this dashboard has restricted permissions.

403.description: View Permission denied for this Dashboard.

get.description: The Like Dashboard endpoint retrieves the list of users who have 'liked' this Dashboard.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The Dashboard name.

200.description: The list of Users who like the Dashboard.

401.description: Authentication required: session key not provided.

post.description: The Like Dashboard endpoint adds the current user to the list of users who like the Dashboard.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The Dashboard name.

200.description: The updated list of Users who like the Dashboard.

401.description: Authentication required: session key not provided.

delete.description: The Unlike Dashboard endpoint removes the current user from the list of users who like the Dashboard.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The Dashboard name.

200.description: The updated list of Users who like the Dashboard.

401.description: Authentication required: session key not provided.

get.description: The Dashboard Names endpoint returns a list of the names of all non-deleted Dashboards.
The Tags endpoint returns a combined list of the unique Tags of all non-deleted Dashboards.
The Search Hints endpoint returns a combined list of the names and tags of all non-deleted Dashboards.  It is designed for autocomplete hints for Dashboard searching.
The Export PDF endpoint, when used synchronously, starts exporting a Dashboard to PDF and waits until it is completed and can be returned.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The Dashboard name.

401.description: Authentication required: this dashboard has restricted permissions.

403.description: View Permission denied for this Dashboard.

post.description: The Export PDF endpoint, when used asynchronously, starts exporting a Dashboard to PDF and returns a key that can be used to poll for the status of the export.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The Dashboard name.

201.description: Export job created successfully; returns the corresponding URL for /exportstatus

401.description: Authentication required: this dashboard has restricted permissions.

403.description: View Permission denied for this Dashboard.

get.description: The Export Status endpoint provides the status and links to exported artifacts for an asynchronous export job.

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: The Export job key.

200.description: Returns the status of the export job.

get.description: The Users endpoint returns a list of all known Users in Cyclotron.
The User endpoint returns the details of a specific User.

parameters.name: username
parameters.description: The sAMAccountName of the User to return.

post.description: The Login endpoint authenticates a User and creates a session.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: The User's credentials.

post.description: The Logout endpoint terminates an active session.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: The session to terminate.

post.description: The Validate endpoint tests whether or not a session is still active.  If it is still active, the Session object is returned.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: The session to validate.

post.description: Encrypts the body of the request and returns the encrypted value.  The encryption process uses a hard-coded cipher and a secret key.  This is a one-way encryption; the encrypted value will only be decrypted internally by the proxy endpoint, when submitting a proxied request.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: The value to encrypt.

200.description: The encrypted form of the original value.

400.description: Missing body or value in request.

500.description: Cyclotron-svc is not configured for encryption.

get.description: Returns a list of cryptographic ciphers supported by the service.

post.description:
Proxies a request through the Cyclotron service.  This wraps the Request library, and supports all options documented here: https://www.npmjs.com/package/request#requestoptions-callback.  The only required option is "url"; all others are optional.

Decrypts any encrypted values embedded in the request, in the form of !{encryptedText}.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: The proxy request.

500.description: Error in proxying the request, OR Cyclotron-svc is not configured for encryption/decryption.

get.description: The LDAP Search endpoint searches LDAP for users & groups matching a partial search string.

parameters.name: q
parameters.description: The q parameter specifies the partial string match used to filter users & groups.  The provided value is used to match either 'sAMAccountName' or 'displayName' properties.

get.description: Calculates assorted statistics about the usage of Cyclotron.

post.description: Records a page view at the current time for a given dashboard, user, etc.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Information about the Dashboard being viewed and the User.

get.description: Gets the most-recent Page View Analytics records. Defaults to the top 100 records; this can be modified via the ?max parameter.

parameters.name: dashboard
parameters.description: Optional Dashboard ID; filters page views to the specified Dashboard.

parameters.name: max
parameters.description: Optionally limits the results to the top N. A value of 0 returns all results.

200.description: An array of Page View Analytics records.

post.description: Records an execution of a Data Source at the current time for a given dashboard.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Information about the executed Data Source.

get.description: Gets the most-recent Data Source Analytics records. Defaults to the top 100 records; this can be modified via the ?max parameter.

parameters.name: dashboard
parameters.description: Optional Dashboard ID; filters data sources to the specified Dashboard.

parameters.name: max
parameters.description: Optionally limits the results to the top N. A value of 0 returns all results.

200.description: An array of Data Source Analytics records.

get.description: Aggregates Page Views over time, with optional time and dashboard filters.

parameters.name: dashboard
parameters.description: Optional Dashboard ID; filters page views to the specified Dashboard.

parameters.name: resolution
parameters.description: Specifies the time granularity to aggregate results int

parameters.name: startDate
parameters.description: Specifies the starting time for the aggregation.

parameters.name: endDate
parameters.description: Specifies the ending time for the aggregation.

get.description: Aggregates Visits over time, with optional time and dashboard filters.

parameters.name: dashboard
parameters.description: Optional Dashboard ID; filters visits to the specified Dashboard.

parameters.name: resolution
parameters.description: Specifies the time granularity to aggregate results int

parameters.name: startDate
parameters.description: Specifies the starting time for the aggregation.

parameters.name: endDate
parameters.description: Specifies the ending time for the aggregation.

get.description: Aggregates Page Views by Unique Visitor, with optional time and dashboard filters. Defaults to the top 100 Users; this can be modified via the ?max parameter.

parameters.name: dashboard
parameters.description: Optional Dashboard ID; filters visits to the specified Dashboard.

parameters.name: startDate
parameters.description: Specifies the starting time for the aggregation.

parameters.name: endDate
parameters.description: Specifies the ending time for the aggregation.

parameters.name: max
parameters.description: Optionally limits the results to the top N. A value of 0 returns all results.

get.description: Aggregates Page Views by Browser, with optional time and dashboard filters. Defaults to the top 100 browsers and versions; this can be modified via the ?max parameter.

parameters.name: dashboard
parameters.description: Optional Dashboard ID; filters visits to the specified Dashboard.

parameters.name: startDate
parameters.description: Specifies the starting time for the aggregation.

parameters.name: endDate
parameters.description: Specifies the ending time for the aggregation.

parameters.name: max
parameters.description: Optionally limits the results to the top N. A value of 0 returns all results.

get.description: Aggregates Widget Views by Widget Type, with optional time and dashboard filters.

parameters.name: dashboard
parameters.description: Optional Dashboard ID; filters visits to the specified Dashboard.

parameters.name: startDate
parameters.description: Specifies the starting time for the aggregation.

parameters.name: endDate
parameters.description: Specifies the ending time for the aggregation.

get.description: Aggregates Data Sources by Type, with optional time and dashboard filters. When filtering by Dashboard, all Data Sources are displayed by default; without a Dashboard filter, it defaults to the top 20 records; this can be modified via the ?max parameter.

parameters.name: dashboard
parameters.description: Optional Dashboard ID; filters visits to the specified Dashboard.

parameters.name: startDate
parameters.description: Specifies the starting time for the aggregation.

parameters.name: endDate
parameters.description: Specifies the ending time for the aggregation.

parameters.name: max
parameters.description: Optionally limits the results to the top N. A value of 0 returns all results.

get.description: Aggregates Data Sources by Name, with optional time and dashboard filters. When filtering by Dashboard, all Data Sources are displayed by default; without a Dashboard filter, it defaults to the top 100 records; this can be modified via the ?max parameter.

parameters.name: dashboard
parameters.description: Optional Dashboard ID; filters visits to the specified Dashboard.

parameters.name: startDate
parameters.description: Specifies the starting time for the aggregation.

parameters.name: endDate
parameters.description: Specifies the ending time for the aggregation.

parameters.name: max
parameters.description: Optionally limits the results to the top N. A value of 0 returns all results.

get.description: Aggregates Data Sources by Error Message, with optional time and dashboard filters. When filtering by Dashboard, all Data Sources are displayed by default; without a Dashboard filter, it defaults to the top 20 records; this can be modified via the ?max parameter.

parameters.name: dashboard
parameters.description: Optional Dashboard ID; filters visits to the specified Dashboard.

parameters.name: startDate
parameters.description: Specifies the starting time for the aggregation.

parameters.name: endDate
parameters.description: Specifies the ending time for the aggregation.

parameters.name: max
parameters.description: Optionally limits the results to the top N. A value of 0 returns all results.

get.description: Returns a list of the most-visited Dashboards. Defaults to the top 100; this can be modified via the ?max parameter.

parameters.name: max
parameters.description: Optionally limits the results to the top N. A value of 0 returns all results.

200.description: An array of Dashboards, ordered by Page Views.

get.description: The Data endpoint returns a list of Data Buckets.

200.description: An array of Data Buckets (without data)

post.description: Posting to the Data endpoint creates a new Data Bucket.

parameters.name: databucket
parameters.description: The Data Bucket to be created.

get.description: Returns a given Data Bucket by key.

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: The Data Bucket key.

200.description: A single Data Bucket, including the data

put.description: Updates a Data Bucket with a modified version. The rev property will be incremented.

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: The Data Bucket key.

parameters.name: databucket
parameters.description: The Data Bucket to be created.

delete.description: Deletes a Data Bucket. This is a hard delete of all data, with no recovery available.

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: The Data Bucket key.

get.description: Returns just the data of a given Data Bucket.

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: The Data Bucket key.

200.description: The data array for a Data Bucket

put.description: Directly replaces the data for a Data Bucket with the provided array. The rev property will be incremented. An optional 'rev' parameter can be provided, which fails the request unless it matches the current rev in the database. This is useful for ensuring sequential updates and preventing accidental overwrites.

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: The Data Bucket key.

parameters.name: data
parameters.description: The data array for a Data Bucket

parameters.name: rev
parameters.description: If provided, the update will only succeed if the Data Bucket has a matching revision. Useful for ensuring sequential updates.

409.description: Conflict; the Data Bucket revision does not match the ?rev query parameter.

post.description: Appends a value or array of values to the data for a given Data Bucket. The rev property will be incremented.

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: The Data Bucket key.

parameters.name: data
parameters.description: Either a single value, or array of values.

post.summary: Upserts an object in the Data Bucket Data
post.description: Upserts (inserts or updates) an object in the data for a given Data Bucket. The rev property will be incremented.

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: The Data Bucket key.

parameters.name: data
parameters.description: An object containing 'keys' and 'data'.

post.summary: Removes matching objects from the Data Bucket Data
post.description: Removes any object that matches all the keys in the body from the data for a given Data Bucket. The rev property will be incremented.

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: The Data Bucket key.

parameters.name: matchingKeys
parameters.description: An object containing keys to match data.

DashboardRef.description: A reference to a Dashboard, containing the name and ID.

DashboardInfo.description: The wrapper around but not including the actual Dashboard definition

deleted.description: Indicates whether or not the Dashboard is deleted.

rev.description: Current revision number of the Dashboard.

viewers.description: If provided, contains the list of users/groups with authorization to view this Dashboard.

editors.description: If provided, contains the list of users/groups with authorization to edit this Dashboard.

visits.description: If Analytics is enabled, this counter records the total number of visits, or times this Dashboard was loaded. Cannot be set manually.

pageViews.description: If Analytics is enabled, this counter records the total number of page views, or times a page in this Dashboard was viewed. Each visit may have multiple page views.  Cannot be set manually.

likes.description: Contains a list of users who 'like' this Dashboard.

Dashboard.description: The entire Dashboard object, including the definition and metadata.

deleted.description: Indicates whether or not the Dashboard is deleted.

rev.description: Current revision number of the Dashboard.

viewers.description: If provided, contains the list of users/groups with authorization to view this Dashboard.

editors.description: If provided, contains the list of users/groups with authorization to edit this Dashboard.

visits.description: If Analytics is enabled, this counter records the total number of visits, or times this Dashboard was loaded. Cannot be set manually.

pageViews.description: If Analytics is enabled, this counter records the total number of page views, or times a page in this Dashboard was viewed. Each visit may have multiple page views.  Cannot be set manually.

likes.description: Contains a list of users who 'like' this Dashboard.

DashboardDefinition.description: Definition of a Dashboard. This is a non-exhaustive list of properties

pages.description: List of Pages in the Dashboard.

scripts.description: List of Scripts to run when the Dashboard is loaded.

styles.description: List of Styles to apply when the Dashboard is loaded.

category.description: Type of account, e.g. user, group
Type of account, e.g. user, group

statusUrl.description: Link to the /exportstatus endpoint with the status for this specific export job.

status.description: The current status of the Export job. (e.g. "running", "completed")

startTime.description: The start time of the job, in milliseconds since the epoch.

duration.description: The duration of the job, in milliseconds.  Continues to increase until the job is completed.

png.description: List of URLs to any PNG images generated by this export.  This list will continue to update until the export has completed.

html.description: List of URLs to any HTML files generated by this export.  This list will continue to update until the export has completed.

pdf.description: List of URLs to any PDF files generated by this export.  This list will continue to update until the export has completed.

memberOf.description: List of LDAP distinguished names for groups this User is a member of.

objectCategory.description: LDAP distinguished name of the category of this user.

category.description: Type of account, e.g. user, group

emailHash.description: An MD5 hash of the User's email address.

firstLogin.description: The date/time of the User's first login to Cyclotron.

lastLogin.description: The date/time of the User's last login to Cyclotron.

timesLoggedIn.description: The number of times this User has logged into Cyclotron.

memberOf.description: List of LDAP distinguished names for groups this User is a member of.

sAMAccountName.description: The Username of the User logged into this Session.

ipAddress.description: The IP address that created this Session.

expiration.description: The current expiration date of the Session.

user.description: The User logged into this Session.

headers.description: Map of headers from the reponse returned by the proxied request.

body.description: The body of the response returned from the proxied request.

date.description: The date this record was logged.

dashboard.description: The ID of the Dashboard being viewed.

rev.description: The current revision of the Dashboard.

visitId.description: The current Visit ID: a unique value generated when a Dashboard is opened.

user.description: The ID of a logged-in User. Either this or 'uid' is required.

uid.description: The unique ID for a non-logged-in User.  Either this or 'user' is required.

ip.description: The IP of the computer logging this record

date.description: The date this record was logged.

dashboard.description: The ID of the Dashboard being viewed.

rev.description: The current revision of the Dashboard.

visitId.description: The current Visit ID: a unique value generated when a Dashboard is opened.

dataSourceName.description: The name of the Data Source that was executed.

dataSourceType.description: The type of Data Source that was executed.

success.description: Indicates whether or not the Data Source execution was successful.

duration.description: The duration of execution, in milliseconds.

browser.description: An object containing Data Source information.

pageViews.description: The aggregated number of Page Views for the current period of time.

visits.description: The aggregated number of Visits for the current period of time.

pageViews.description: The aggregated number of Page Views for the current user.
The aggregated number of Page Views for the current user.

widgetViews.description: The aggregated number of Widget Views for the Widget Type.

count.description: The total number of executions of this Data Source type.

successCount.description: The number of successful executions of this Data Source type.

successRate.description: The success rate for this Data Source type, calculated as the ratio of successful executions to total executions.

avgDuration.description: The average duration of all executions of this Data Source type.

dashboardName.description: The Dashboard containing the Data Source.

count.description: The total number of executions of this Data Source.

successCount.description: The number of successful executions of this Data Source.

successRate.description: The success rate for this Data Source, calculated as the ratio of successful executions to total executions.

avgDuration.description: The average duration of all executions of this Data Source.

count.description: The total number of Data Source executions with this error message.

avgDuration.description: The average duration of all executions with this error message.

DataBucket.description: The container for an array of data stored within Cyclotron

key.description: Uniquely identifying key of the Data Bucket.

createdDate.description: Date/time the Data Bucket was created.

rev.description: Current revision number of the Dashboard.

data.description: Array of data contained in the Data Bucket.
